ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So taste! We will increase you only in punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So taste (the fruit of what you sowed), for We shall add nothing but torment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So taste (the fruit of your deeds). We shall only increase your torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (They will be told), "Suffer, We shall only increase the torment for you".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore taste it now – We shall not increase anything for you except the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So taste you. No increase shall We give you, except in torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So taste! for We will not add to you aught but chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Taste! We shall increase you not save in chastisement.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So taste (of that which ye have earned). No increase do We give you save of torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [So We shall say], "Taste, then, [the fruit of your evil doings,] for now We shall bestow on you nothing but more and more suffering!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Taste therefore. We shall not increase you in aught but torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So [now] taste! We shall increase you in nothing but punishment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds); for no increase shall We grant you, except in Punishment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So taste you (the results of your evil actions); no increase shall We give you, except in torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Taste! We shall not increase you except in punishment'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So taste! We will increase you only in suffering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:30] ‘So [now] taste! — in other words, it will be said to them in the Hereafter, when the chastisement has befallen them: taste [now] your requital! For We will increase you in nothing but chastisement’, in addition to your [due] chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So taste) the chastisement in the Fire. (No increase do We give you) in the Fire (save of torment) one kind 724 of torment after another.
